revamp.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to change something in order to improve it and make it seem more modern
revamp.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Many older companies are revamping their image.
revamp.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to organize something in a new and more modern way so that it operates more effectively
revamp.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: It revamped its biggest US car-making operation to make it function more like Japanese companies.
